storyInfo: The Trilby Asher tries his hardest to stop Degenbrecher, only to find himself outmatched. Just as Degenbrecher reaches the Viscount, the train is pulling into the station.

attributes.content: Look! You can see the mountain outside!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: My god, it's way too close. Is that what the Kjerags call Karlan? Doesn't matter. It's gorgeous!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: S-Say, can you close the window...?
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Th-The wind's too strong. I-I'm starting to have trouble even speaking.
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Come on, exaggerating much? It's not that bad, you can take it...
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Really? You seriously don't feel cold at all? Look at you. You barely have pants onâ€”
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, watch what you're saying, you hooligan.
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: The tights I'm wearing are thick enough to keep me warm! Not like that lame getup you're wearing!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Owww... Fine, fine, fine. Whatever you say.
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Hmph, now get in here. I'm about to take a selfie!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, did you hear something just now?
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen! Good day! Good day!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Frightfully sorry for interrupting your leisurely sightseeing! Please head back to your seats for the moment and make way. Weâ€”
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Alright, cut it out with the fancy talk! We don't have time for that!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Sorry, everyone! Out of the way!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Rosalind! That is no way for a lady to speak!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Eh, eh, Rosalind, not so rough. You're about to tear my sleeve off!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Uh, what kind of Kjerag tradition is this?
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Should we run up the train like them, too...?
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: That can't be a tradition, can it? Sounds so stupid. I'm not doing it.
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Whatever, let's take our selfie!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Look at the camera! Three... Two...
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: I've never been one for tag.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I can't say I'm a fan either. Perhaps we can sit down for a nice conversation?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You're the guilty ones trying to run.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And you'd better keep running. Don't stop.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, the segment coming up in five minutes offers the best views. If you want to take pictures, there is a better opportunity coming up.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enjoy your trip.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And who were those people?
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: No clue...
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: But you might just be right. Maybe Kjerag has some kind of tradition of running laps up and down the train...
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: Well, when in Londinium, as the saying goes...
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: What's wrong, babe? You've been spacing out for a while.
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: My picture! My picture!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: What about it? The lady just now said we should wait another five minutes for better scenery. Might as well listen to her.
attributes.name: Trembling Tourist

attributes.content: That's not what I'm talking about! Look! I got a picture of that lady's face!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: She looks kinda familiar. Like I've seen her before somewhere...
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: But that's not the point! The important thing is her outfit is just so cool!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: I'm going to treasure this picture!
attributes.name: Spirited Tourist

attributes.content: Let me show you all something.
attributes.name: Hospitable Villager

attributes.content: This is the famous Kjerag fondue, made with the finest local cheeses to give it its full-bodied flavor. You won't find this taste anywhere outside Kjerag!
attributes.name: Hospitable Villager

attributes.content: Is it really that amazing?
attributes.name: Curious Tourist

attributes.content: C'mon! Hurry up!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: W-Wait, Rosalind... *cough*!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Pardon me, ladies and gentlemen. The fondue's taste is fine indeed, but I recommend adding some pepper for a richer flavorâ€”!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Wh-Who was that?
attributes.name: Hospitable Villager

attributes.content: Again?!
attributes.name: Hospitable Villager

attributes.content: So is this how train trips go in Kjerag? It's just like my friends told me. Very unique.
attributes.name: Curious Tourist

attributes.content: Man, this is something else with pepper! I love it!
attributes.name: Curious Tourist

attributes.content: They're all here. I caught 'em all!
attributes.name: Kjerag Villager

attributes.content: Thanks to all of you, I finally caught every last fowlbeast. I don't even know how to begin to show my appreciation...
attributes.name: Kjerag Villager

attributes.content: Make sure your sacks are tied tight this time, old man.
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: I'll pretend this never happened... but only just this once. Remember, no pets allowed on our trains!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: This can never happen again!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Yes, of course. Of course.
attributes.name: Kjerag Villager

attributes.content: O-Oh, young'un, what's the rush?
attributes.name: Kjerag Villager

attributes.content: M-Ma'am! Please don't run on the train!
attributes.name: Conductor

attributes.content: Hey! You, with the funny hat! Watch... it!
attributes.name: Kjerag Villager

attributes.content: Oh no! My fowlbeasts! My fowlbeasts got loose again!
attributes.name: Kjerag Villager

attributes.content: What the hell is it with these blind boxes? I'm not pulling the limited one at all!
attributes.name: Annoyed Tourist

attributes.content: Just one more... Just one more try...!
attributes.name: Annoyed Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, watch it, morons! You'll break my blind boxes...
attributes.name: Annoyed Tourist

attributes.content: Ahh! I-It's the limited one!
attributes.name: Annoyed Tourist

attributes.content: This is the end of the line.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The last car.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Let's call it quits with this game of chase?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Madam, you've won. The outcome is all but certain.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I hope we can...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You talk too much.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I don't have time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Don't worry, Trilby Asher. I won't forget that you want to talk.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'll be back later to have a one-on-one chat with you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Out, or I'll get you out.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: A-Ahem.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: H-Hey, lady! I'm over here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: *cough*, *spit*. All this dust all on the ground... So, did you need me for something?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: It's not you that I'm looking for.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Leto
Leto
attributes.content: But there's no one else here...

attributes.name: Leto
attributes.content: Ouch!
(Don't move!)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Enough of this charade.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Wh-What charade? Y-You've got it all wrong!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (Eh, quiet down, will you? I'm trying to keep you out of sight!)
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: (D-Don't pull my hair!)
You're from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Huh? I am... You know about Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Um, are you one of the friends the Doctor made on Rhodes Island's last trip here?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: A friend? No, I'm not.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Enough. I don't have time to chat.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Show yourself before my patience runs out.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: (Forget it, young lady. Just let me out!)
Haah...!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: I'm touched by the fact that you would go to such lengths to help me, Rosalind, but wasn't that a bit too cruel of you...?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Eek... My hair... my moustache.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Finally.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What? So you two know each other?
attributes.name: Leto
Harold
attributes.content: A-Ahem.

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: I wouldn't say we know each other. We've merely met a few times.
Madam Degenbrecher, it's been a while. I must've rather embarrassed myself.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Save the pleasantries.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Craigavon, Leone from the mountain needs to see you, urgently.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Leones...? See me?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Hold on, it's Leones who's looking for me, not you...?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: He asked me to come find you. That's all.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Why is he so eager to see me?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, I seem to have forgotten something... Hmm...
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You forgot Lily is still waiting for you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: ...Right, Lily!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Who's Lily... No way, you forgot your mistress?
attributes.name: Leto
Harold
attributes.content: Mistressâ€”?!

attributes.name: Harold
attributes.content: No, not a mistress. *cough*â€”
...Lord Viscount, you may well damage Victoria's image if you conduct yourself in this way.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If the Viscountess and your daughter were to learn about this...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Whoa, what a scumbag.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Hold on! Ahem, dammit, Bloody Asher! It's not what you think!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lily isâ€”
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, we will soon be arriving at our terminusâ€”
Lake Silberneherze Station.
Please be sure to take all your belongings with you and alight via the exits in the front and back of each car in an orderly fashion.
Thank you for riding the Saintess Express.
You haven't wasted too much time.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: But you'd best climb the mountain and find Leones as soon as you get off the train. He's waiting for you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Maybe we should split up here. Mamochka wouldn't like me traveling with you.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, *cough*, Lilyâ€”
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: â€”Lily's not human!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: You're even going to badmouth her like that?!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: No, no, no, no. Pff, even I'm cracking up now. Oh, my chest hurts.
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Lily's a burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: A burdenbeast.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: ...Did I not mention it before?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Trilby Asher, would you stop playing dumb!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Do you expect me to believe your spies have never reported on my actions in Kjerag?
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: Sorry, but the name of the burdenbeast you nursed back to health is not important enough for me to remember.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: ...So, he's not a scumbag, and he's not in danger?
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I thought it was a life-or-death thing, what with us getting chased and all that.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: I... *sigh*! Rosalind, this has to do with my reputation!
attributes.name: Harold

attributes.content: How much more time do you want to waste?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Don't just stand there like an idiot.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The train is entering the station.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher
